content: सार्वधातुक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (की|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) Applicable to the whole of a radical term, or to the complete form of the verbal base after the conjugational characteristics have been affixed, {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} to the four conjugational or special tenses. --कं <ab>N.</ab> of the verbal terminations of the four conjugational tenses (strictly, the personal terminations of all tenses and moods except the Perfect and Benedictive and the affixes distinguished by a mute श्).
